articles.description: Clubhouse, which momentarily operated away from the shadow of China's Great Firewall, allowed young Chinese to speak with strangers in Hong Kong, Taiwan and other parts of the world.

articles.author: Lucy Dean
articles.title: ‘Shocking’: Major bank blocks 2,500 transactions for concerning reason - Yahoo Finance Australia
articles.description: If it happens too many times, the customer will be booted from the bank.
articles.content:
(Photo by WILLIAM WEST/AFP via Getty Images)
Westpac has blocked 2,500 transactions in the last few months due to offensive or abusive language, and is now threatening to ban repeat offenders.
